text.more:
The nodes show people. 
The nodes can be further grouped by color. The color represents the gender of the person.
The edges show the relations between people.
The color represents a specific kind of relation.
Red means family; Green means correspondance.
text.intro:
This is a visualisation of the network of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata. 
The graph shows people who have corresponded with Guido Gezelle and with who Guido Gezelle has corresponded.
It also shows who of the correspondents is family of each other.
text.title: Network of correspondents of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata
